channel.title: Need half good coders help
channel.description:
Ok, Heres my situatuion, i dont like people using yell on my server so i am working on editing a chat server that runs with java, and im doing it for my server so thats why im posting it here. What i need is help with reading and writing files, i dont know how to do it at all, and i want to make have it make an info file for people. so when they sign on and enter a name they can type a register command and it would write a text file with thier name as the filename. then i need to know how to read the file and set all the info in the file to a var.
i want the files to be set up like username password ip usercolor rights admin comment

item.title: Need half good coders help
item.dc:creator: @Hiaburi Hiaburi
item.description:
@Hiaburi wrote:

yea, but if i can get it working good enough, im gunna get it hosted and itl be liek aim sept quicker because it wont use all the gui stuff but liek i said only problem is i never learned how to use java to read and write files…

hmm im just going to dl another rsserver nad try to get it from there…

Read full topic
